meaningMnemonic: Look at that <kanji>suspicious</kanji> <kanji>beast</kanji>... it's Godzilla, walking around looking suspicious. What is Godzilla? He is a <vocabulary>giant monster</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
